actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on certain stuffed toy figures.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on stuffed toy figures of animate objects (except dolls) not having a spring mechanism and not exceeding 25 inches in length, width, or height.

titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on certain stuffed toy figures.
